1.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Throw in
1.respA:
Pass the ball to
any teammate
1.respB:
Pass the ball to
the goalkeeper

2.pregunta:
What you should do in this situation? 
 Recibir el balón iniciando el partido
2.respD: Throw the ball to the sideline

3.respA: Pass the ball to any teammate
3.respB: Pass the ball to the goalkeeper
3.respD: Pass the ball to the free teammate

4.respA: Pass the ball to your teammate
4.respB: Shoot on the goalkeeper  second post

5.pregunta: Mano a mano con el portero
5.respA: Shoot on the goalkeeper far post

7.respD: Try to take the second warning

8.respD: Throw the ball out of the field

9.pregunta: Defendiendo en un mano a mano
9.respA: Hold the striker and steal the ball

10.pregunta: Recibir centro por arriba y sin marca dentro del área
10.respB: Put down the ball and shoot on goal
10.respC: Recieve the ball and go on a 1 vs GK

11.respA: Leave the field and cheer my teammate

12.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? Receiving the ball after kickoff
12.respD: Kick the ball to the sideline

13.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? Free kick with a wall
13.respA: Pass the ball to a teammate

14.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? 1v1 against the goalie
14.respA: Shoot to the far post of the goalkeeper

15.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? PK

16.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? Booked

17.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? Build up play after pressing to the goalie
17.respA: Pass with the left or right defenders
17.respC: Kick the ball far from the area
17.respD: Kick the ball out of the field

18.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? 1v1 Defending
18.respA: Hold the player and then steal the ball

19.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? Receiving a cross in the air without opposition
19.respA: Header with power to the goal
19.respC: Control and play against the goalkeeper

20.pregunta: What you should do in this situation? Being sub
20.respA: Come out and cheer for the teammate who is coming in
20.respC: Don’t pay attention to the substitution
